Package main.G1HRPS

Class AppManager

java.lang.Object
main.G1HRPS.AppManager
public class AppManager extends Object
Manager that handles running the main application.
Author:
Steph Wong

  • Constructor Details

    • AppManager

      public AppManager()
      Constructor that initializes each of the manager objects and scanner. Also initializes APP_MENU_LIST using the AppMenuItem enumset.

  • Method Details

    • Initialize

      public void Initialize()
      Call InitializeDB for all managers.

    • Run

      public void Run()
      Handles input and output of console messages. Calls respective managers to perform functions.

    • PrintMenu

      private main.G1HRPS.AppMenuItem PrintMenu()
      Returns:
      selected menu option

    • PrintGuestSubMenu

      private void PrintGuestSubMenu(main.G1HRPS.Guest sub_menu_guest)
      This method handles the i/o sub menu for Guests. For use after adding/searching a guest.
      Parameters:
      sub_menu_guest - the guest obj to operate on

    • PrintRoomServiceMenu

      private List<main.G1HRPS.MenuItem> PrintRoomServiceMenu()
      Prints room service menu, handling the i/o of selecting menu items. After completing order, returns a list of selected items to be processed.
      Returns:
      a list of menu items selected

    • CreateNewGuest

      private main.G1HRPS.Guest CreateNewGuest()
      Handles the input and output for creating new guest. Returned guest object can be applied to PrintGuestSubMenu(Guest sub_menu_guest).
      Returns:
      Guest object if created successfully, else returns null.

    • CreateNewRoom

      private void CreateNewRoom()
      Handles the input and output for creating new room.

    • PickRoom

      private int PickRoom()
      Handles i/o for picking a vacant room to check in.
      Returns:
      room number to be further processed (e.g. check in)

    • CreateNewReservation

      private void CreateNewReservation(String guest_id)
      Handles the input and output for creating new reservation.
      Parameters:
      guest_id - the guest making this reservation.

    • GetDatetimeStringFromDateInput

      private LocalDateTime GetDatetimeStringFromDateInput(String date_format)
      Function to get a formatted local date time for a date only input.
      Parameters:
      date_format - format used for the date input
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime a formatted local date time object

    • GetStringFromInput

      private String GetStringFromInput()
      Function to get string from user input and handles exceptions.
      Returns:
      String user input

    • GetUppercaseStringFromInput

      private String GetUppercaseStringFromInput()
      Function to get UPPERCASE string from user input and handles exceptions. Used for case sensitive columns such as search fields.
      Returns:
      String user input

    • GetIntFromInput

      private int GetIntFromInput()
      Function to get 0 inclusive integer from user input and handles exception.
      Returns:
      int user input

    • GetIntFromInput

      private int GetIntFromInput(int inclusive_min, int inclusive_max)
      Function to get ranged integer from user input and handles exception.
      Parameters:
      inclusive_min - minimum value for input that is included
      inclusive_max - maximum value for input that is included
      Returns:
      int user input

      Returns:
      int user input

    • GetEnumFromInput

      private <T> T GetEnumFromInput(T[] opt_list)
      Present user with a list of choices from an enumset.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the enumset
      Parameters:
      opt_list - an array of the enum options
      Returns:
      the enum selected by user input

    • GetBooleanFromInput

      private Boolean GetBooleanFromInput()
      Present user with a choice of true or false options.
      Returns:
      return user's input in Boolean.

    • SearchManagerList

      private <T> T SearchManagerList(main.G1HRPS.Supermanager<T> sm)
      Gets input of search text from user and calls the SearchList method of Supermanager.

      Example usage: GuestManager guest_manager = new GuestManager(); SearchList(guest_manager);

      Type Parameters:
      T - type which the manager is managing
      Parameters:
      sm - a generic type manager which has implemented Supermanager
      Returns:
      the object matching the search text

    • DisplayList

      private <T> void DisplayList(main.G1HRPS.Supermanager<T> sm)
      Calls the GetList method of Supermanager and then access each object and calls toString.

      Example usage: GuestManager guest_manager = new GuestManager(); DisplayList(guest_manager);

      Type Parameters:
      T - type which the manager is managing
      Parameters:
      sm - a generic type manager which has implemented Supermanager

    • Quit

      private void Quit()
      Calls SaveDB for all managers.
